AT.name: Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate Spezial-Demo
AT.description: Willkommen in der Welt von Monster Hunter! Mach deine ersten Schritte im abwechslungsreichen Universum von Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate. Rüste dich aus und brich auf zur Jagd nach den wilden Monstern, die über die Welt herschen! - Begib dich allein oder mit Freunden im Lokalen Spiel oder im Online-Multiplayer auf die Reise! - Probiere die 14 unterschiedlichen Waffenklassen aus und finde deine Lieblingswaffe. - Dank optionaler Tutorials ist es jedem möglich, ein fähiger Jäger zu werden. Beachte bitte, dass ab dem 30.06.2016 die Online-Funktionen für diesen Titel nicht mehr zugänglich sein werden.

AU.name: Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate Special Demo
AU.description: Welcome to the world of Monster Hunter! Take your first steps to discovering Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate and its diverse universe. Get ready to gear up, track down and hunt the ferocious monsters that reign over the world! - Venture alone or gather your friends to hunt in local or online multiplayer! - Try all 14 different weapon classes, and find your weapon of choice - Optional tutorials available for all to become a skilled hunter Please note that from the 30/06/2016 onwards, the online functions for this title will no longer be accessible.

BG.name: Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate Special Demo
BG.description: Welcome to the world of Monster Hunter! Take your first steps to discovering Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate and its diverse universe. Get ready to gear up, track down and hunt the ferocious monsters that reign over the world! - Venture alone or gather your friends to hunt in local or online multiplayer! - Try all 14 different weapon classes, and find your weapon of choice - Optional tutorials available for all to become a skilled hunter Please note that from the 30/06/2016 onwards, the online functions for this title will no longer be accessible.

BE.name: Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate Démo spéciale
BE.description: Bienvenue dans l'univers de Monster Hunter ! Faites vos premiers pas dans l'incroyable univers de Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate. Préparez-vous à traquer et à chasser les monstres féroces qui règnent partout dans le monde ! - Aventurez-vous seul ou rejoignez vos amis pour chasser dans le mode multijoueur local ou en ligne ! - Essayez les 14 catégories d'armes différentes et trouvez celle qui vous convient le mieux - Des tutoriels sont disponibles en option pour ceux qui souhaitent devenir un chasseur expérimenté Veuillez prendre note qu'à partir du 30/06/2016, les fonctions en ligne de ce jeu ne seront plus accessibles.

ES.name: Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate Demo especial
ES.description: ¡Te damos la bienvenida al universo de Monster Hunter! ¡Sumérgete en el variopinto mundo de Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate y prepárate para localizar y dar caza a los feroces monstruos que dominan el planeta! - ¡Vive esta aventura en solitario o reúne a tus amigos para cazar en modo local o multijugador! - ¡Prueba los 14 tipos distintos de armas hasta dar con la que mejor se adapte a ti! - ¡Domina el arte de la caza gracias a los tutoriales opcionales! Las funciones online para este título no estarán disponibles a partir de 30/06/2016.

IT.name: Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate Demo speciale
IT.description: Il mondo di Monster Hunter ti dà il benvenuto! Scopri lo sconfinato universo di Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate e preparati a dare la caccia alle bestie feroci che hanno infestato il mondo! - Avventurati in una caccia per giocatore singolo oppure alleati con gli amici in modalità wireless o online. - Prova 14 diverse classi di armi per trovare il tuo stile di combattimento ideale. - Puoi anche approfittare dei tutorial per diventare un vero maestro nell'arte venatoria. Tieni presente che dal 30/06/2016, le funzionalità online per questo titolo non saranno più disponibili.

NL.name: Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate Speciale Demo
NL.description: Welkom in de wereld van Monster Hunter! Neem de eerste stappen in het ultieme en diverse universum van Monster Hunter 4. Trek je uitrusting aan, volg de sporen en jaag op de bloeddorstige monsters die over de wereld heersen! - Waag het alleen in de spelstand voor één speler of jaag samen met je vrienden in de meerspelerstand! - Probeer alle 14 verschillende wapen categorieën uit en maak je keuze - Er zijn voor iedereen tutorials beschikbaar om een bekwame jager te worden Wees je ervan bewust dat vanaf 30-06-2016, de online functies voor deze demo niet langer beschikbaar zullen zijn.

NZ.name: Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate Special Demo
NZ.description: Welcome to the world of Monster Hunter! Take your first steps to discovering Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate and its diverse universe. Get ready to gear up, track down and hunt the ferocious monsters that reign over the world! - Venture alone or gather your friends to hunt in local or online multiplayer! - Try all 14 different weapon classes, and find your weapon of choice - Optional tutorials available for all to become a skilled hunter Please note that from the 30/06/2016 onwards, the online functions for this title will no longer be accessible.

PL.name: Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate Special Demo
PL.description: Welcome to the world of Monster Hunter! Take your first steps to discovering Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate and its diverse universe. Get ready to gear up, track down and hunt the ferocious monsters that reign over the world! - Venture alone or gather your friends to hunt in local or online multiplayer! - Try all 14 different weapon classes, and find your weapon of choice - Optional tutorials available for all to become a skilled hunter Please note that from the 30/06/2016 onwards, the online functions for this title will no longer be accessible.

PT.name: Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate Demo especial
PT.description: Bem-vindo ao mundo de Monster Hunter! Dá os teus primeiros passos no universo repleto de novidades de Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate. Empunha as tuas melhores armas para seguir o rasto e abater as criaturas grotescas que aterrorizam o mundo! - Parte para a caça sozinho ou une-te a amigos em modo de jogo local ou de multijogador! - Experimenta as 14 classes de armamento diferentes e descobre a tua arma de eleição! - Existem vários tutoriais opcionais disponíveis, para que qualquer jogador possa tornar-se num caçador de elite. A partir de 30/06/2016, as funcionalidades online deste título deixarão de estar acessíveis.

RU.name: Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate Особая демоверсия
RU.description: Добро пожаловать в мир Monster Hunter! Сделайте первые шаги в многоликой Вселенной Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate! Подготовьтесь к охоте на свирепых монстров, правящих миром! - Охотьтесь в одиночку в локальной игре или вместе с друзьями в многопользовательском режиме! - Испытайте все 14 видов оружия и подберите то, что подходит именно вам! - Каждый может стать профессиональным охотником на монстров с помощью опционально доступных игровых учебников! Обратите внимание, что с 30.06.2016 года онлайн функции для этой версии игры больше не будут доступны.

SE.name: Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate Special Demo
SE.description: Welcome to the world of Monster Hunter! Take your first steps to discovering Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate and its diverse universe. Get ready to gear up, track down and hunt the ferocious monsters that reign over the world! - Venture alone or gather your friends to hunt in local or online multiplayer! - Try all 14 different weapon classes, and find your weapon of choice - Optional tutorials available for all to become a skilled hunter Please note that from the 30/06/2016 onwards, the online functions for this title will no longer be accessible.
